name: Machines-cash
description: spend crypto, not cash. unlimited virtual cards for private payments - like Apple hide my email! virtual cards machinesCash virtual cards are like apple’s hide my email for crypto payments. connect any wallet and issue unlimited cards. dashboard a control panel for crypto spending. issue unlimited cards with isolated accounts and fresh addresses. separate spending for bills, subscriptions, and daily use. add limits, automations, and hooks for agents. track all balances in one place. private payments use separate virtual cards for different activities so payments don’t leak your history. top up from a wallet or exchange into virtual card balances.
